item.title: Speaking on Knowledge Blockchains in Fribourg
item.description: On Friday, July 20th, I have the opportunity to visit the University of Fribourg and discuss our Knowledge Blockchains approach there.

item.title: ECIS Talk on Decentralized Process Modeling and Instance Tracking
item.description: The slides of the talk given today at the 2018 European Conference on Information Systems are available for download.

item.title: Knowledge Blockchain Talk at EMISA 2018
item.description: I’m looking forward to the 9th International Workshop on Enterprise Modeling and Information Systems Architectures “EMISA 2018” on May 24-25 in Rostock!

item.title: Decentralized Process Modeling and Instance Tracking
item.description: As of yesterday, my paper on decentralized process modeling and instance tracking has been accepted for ECIS 2018 – this work constitutes the main part of my thesis and I’m very excited to discuss it in Portsmouth in June!

item.title: HICSS 51 Proceedings
item.description: The proceedings of the 51st Hawaii International Conference on System Sciences are online here.

item.title: Implementation Project of a SERM Data Modeling Tool
item.description: As a contribution to the PrOse 2017 workshop at PoEM 2017 I presented our paper on “Experiences from the Implementation of a Structured-Entity-Relationship Modeling Method in a Student Project”.

item.title: Knowledge Blockchain at HICSS-51
item.description: Our Paper on immutably storing, sharing and managing enterprise models on a “Knowledge Blockchain” for Knowledge Management has been accepted for the 51st Hawaii International Conference on System Sciences (HICSS-51)!

item.title: Business Process Modeling with the Semantic Object Model
item.description: Richard Herz, Andreas Steffan and I authored a book chapter on the introduction of the Semantic Object Model (SOM) using a case study based on the zooplus AG. The german language publication is available at Springer Link. Further information on the Semantic Object Model by Ferstl and Sinz can be found in this english language publication. Härer F., Steffan A., Herz R.A. (2016) Fallstudienbasierte Einführung von SOM. In: Benker T., Jürck C.
